name: @kauabunga/cloudbuild-ui-agent
description: Function that sends a slack notification on the completion of a CloudBuild run

scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:nonprod && yarn deploy:preprod && yarn deploy:prod
scripts.deploy:nonprod: gcloud functions deploy ciCloudbuildUiAgent --region australia-southeast1 --trigger-topic cloud-builds --runtime nodejs14 --memory 256MB --set-env-vars "WEBHOOK_URL=https://australia-southeast1-oba-cloudbuild.cloudfunctions.net/helloWorld" --project oba-nonprod
scripts.deploy:preprod: gcloud functions deploy ciCloudbuildUiAgent --region australia-southeast1 --trigger-topic cloud-builds --runtime nodejs14 --memory 256MB --set-env-vars "WEBHOOK_URL=https://australia-southeast1-oba-cloudbuild.cloudfunctions.net/helloWorld" --project oba-preprod
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud functions deploy ciCloudbuildUiAgent --region australia-southeast1 --trigger-topic cloud-builds --runtime nodejs14 --memory 256MB --set-env-vars "WEBHOOK_URL=https://australia-southeast1-oba-cloudbuild.cloudfunctions.net/helloWorld" --project oba-prod
